actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 5901 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the authorized maximum uniform allowance for Federal employees to $300 per annum.

summary.text: Increases the authorized maximum uniform allowance for Federal employees to $300 per year.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5901 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the authorized maximum uniform allowance for Federal employees to $300 per annum.
